h3.a: The ASK Wellness Team - Support during Social Distancing

div.div:
Our Virtual School Hours: Monday - Thursday 9:00am - 3:00pm Friday 9:00am - 11:00p
Kylee Shurter, School Counselor kshurter@theaskacademy.org April Marquez, Social Worker amarquez@theaskacademy.org
Visit our web page located under Programs/Activities

img.alt: Wash Hands to prevent spreading of germs

div.div: Click the read more to view information from the CDC and PED.
Here are a few things to keep in mind...

img.alt: image answers attendance truancy vs excessive absences

h3.a: When do absences become a problem?

div.div: Do you have questions about absences? Click on the flyer..

div.h3:
Parents and Scholars,
I know that you have been receiving a lot of emails from us lately. This is done in an effort to help everyone understand this extraordinary situation. You will also be receiving an email from each of your project managers outlining their expectations, access to materials, and anything else that they believe is important to the learning process during the next 3 weeks. By getting individual messages you will know each manger's expectations.
Thank you for your patience,

div.span:
The ASK Academy
4550 Sundt Road NE
Rio Rancho, NM 87124
